verses.verse: Hearken <WH8085> to me <WH7291>, ye that follow after righteousness <WH6664>, ye that seek <WH1245> Jehovah <WH3068>: look <WH5027> unto the rock <WH6697> whence ye were hewn <WH2672>, and to the hole <WH4718> of the pit <WH953> whence ye were digged <WH5365>.
